name: AntVenture (messier, atomtwist)
description:
As a lone ant, you must find your way back to the colony, and lead your ant friends home.

-Realistic Ant survival gameplay

- Crazy rain effects

-Ant friends

-Immersive sounds

-A nice journey

--------------------------------------------

Made by:

Gianfranco, Andreas, Milan, Balazs at Nordic Game Jam 2022.
